mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, name, password, birth_date, phone_number, email, role) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{password}, #{birthDate}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{role})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name=#{name}, password=#{password}, birth_date=#{birthDate}, phone_number=#{phoneNumber}, email=#{email}, role=#{role} WHERE user_id=#{userId}
